markdownRemark.html: Aloha is a private members club but welcome non-members at certain times. This 18-hole golf course is situated in Marbella. This course has a great layout, perfect greens, is very well maintained and has a super restaurant. The clubhouse with it's very attentive staff and varied menu, is open to non-members and non-golfers alike.

frontmatter.title: Aloha Club de Golf

The clubhouse with it's very attentive staff and varied menu, is open to non-members and non-golfers alike.
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 175.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 175.00 euros
